Datatable.LocalizationPair: Your civilization has already explored the galaxy, now all that is left is to take it.
Reveals all Solar Systems in the Galaxy
Your civilization has already expended the resources to explore their constellation, but now they can finally explore it.
Reveals all Nodes in Starting Constellation
With an extragalactic knowledge of where all the true landmarks of the galaxy are, finding a place to hide or escape to has never been easier.
Reveals all Special Nodes in the Galaxy
Nature instincts make it easy to determine roughly where your prey lay.
Reveals all the location of all Home Systems in the Galaxy
As a result of its history of decentralized government, this faction is incapable of enforcing much in the way of empire-wide legislation.
This faction strives for centralized government and can more easily maintain empire-wide legislation.
